text: Manuel Robles Aguila (born March 6, 1959 in Monachil, Granada) is a table tennis athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is class 5 player. He played table tennis at the 1996 Summer Paralympics, 2000 Summer Paralympics and 2004 Summer Paralympics. In 2000, he finished third in the Open 1-5 Singles table tennis game. == References == Category:Spanish table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Granada Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:1996 Summer Paralympics
title: Manuel Robles (table tennis)
